channel.title: Make money while you sleep no joke!
channel.description:
Make money doing nothing * iv'e made 400 dollars so far, its really no joke.
If you know how internet marketing works then this is a good example to start making money. How it works is by views, more people = more advertisers. The more people who advertise generates page popularity thus making money from advertising. just join under my referral and then create your account and youll get a refferal link. with the link each member who creates a account earns you a PEP, these are like shares to a company, they give you a small amount of money for you to invest and then you end up paying them back like 2 dollars out of every 10 you make, and this is all done while you sleep, go to school etc, you just leave it and try to advertise your referral as much as possible to make 300K + a year if spent 1 hour daily advertising.

item.title: Make money while you sleep no joke!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

loved:

Wrong Section, and don’t try and scam people fool, dont click the link guys~[/quote][quote=“WhiteWolves, post:3, topic:304666”]don’tclick the link!!!

Thing is, at the end (No I didn’t click the link, just noticing this) of the link, note that it says “ref=killamess”. Referral link fail? You should at least put it in a hyperlink if you wanna be sneaky about it…

Read full topic
item.source: Make money while you sleep no joke!
